title: Espresso Cabinetry, 24-Hour On-Call Maintenance, Pet Friendly
posting_body: Welcome To Life At Terra House Apartments in San JoseSet in Silicon Valley, Terra House Apartments is your ticket to modern living.
We are currently in the process of changing our name from Avana Skyway to Terra House.
Our studio, one, and two bedroom apartments for rent in San Jose CA, boast convenient access to the Bay Area.
We also offer premier community amenities and handsomely upgraded living spaces in picturesque surroundings.
Cool off in our three sparkling outdoor swimming pools then retreat to your spacious apartment home to create a restaurant-quality meal in your gourmet kitchen.
On the weekends, update your wardrobe at Westfield Oakridge or take a day trip to San Francisco.
Luxury is at your fingertips at Terra House Apartments.
Visit our luxury San Jose, CA apartments and discover a new standard of living.
-Close to CAL train and VTA light rail stop
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
